survey.question: How much did you enjoy the task?
How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?

How difficult was it to understand your partner's instructions?

How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of Spanish?
How likely do you think it is that your partner is bilingual?
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: friendly
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative

chat.msg: hola, you ready?
si
cool. i'm at the starting point near the twig that leads to a small island
El tigre está más adelante en una isla. ¿cual es el camino?
Ok so de ahi you are going to go down un square
got it, i've moved down one square
i see a butterfly to my southeast and a parrot to my southwest. ¿por dónde sigo?
Yeah go around el parrot but dont pass el elephant
alright, walked around the parrot without passing the elephant
Hay una isla con una rana al sureste de aquí. ¿que sigue?
walk past the rocks onto the island with la rana y entonces keep going directly over the alligator
crossed the rocks, moved past the frog, and went straight over the alligator
after the alligator move over the black rock alado y entonces pass the rocks leading to the giraffe island
moved over the black rock next to the alligator, and passed the rocks towards the giraffe island
¿Puedo ver la jirafa? ¿Qué sigue?
go down the edge that connect the water and giraffe island and then cross over the stick to where the snake is
caminé por el borde que conecta el agua y la isla de la jirafa y crucé el palo hasta donde está la serpiente
Where to now?
go over the snake and the treasure should be right there
moved over snake, and hey, there's the treasure
*finished*! esto ha sido divertido, ¿eh?

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to go?
ready, para adonde voy
primero, ve un poco hacia la izquierda, pasando por debajo de una banca de madera. luego, cruza el camino hacia un puesto de flores
but hey, don't get to the position. I want to make you turn 180 degrees to the left, turn towards the white dog. you got it?
ok now what
impeccable! ahora camina hacia el sur, pasando sobre la rama
sigue caminando y mira a otro perro blanco cerca de un mantel de picnic a cuadros. ¿lo ves?
si lo veo
brilliant! passes over the tablecloth, brushing against a bowl of berries, and continues west
ok I passed them now what
perfecto! ahora encontrarás otra rama de madera que cruza un río
quiero que lo cruces hacia el norte
ok listo
ahora que ago?
estas ahi?
no se que hacer now?
pues no se
hola?
después de cruzar el río, da la vuelta al arbusto verde por la derecha hacia el puesto de flores
recuerda, no toques el arbusto
hey! Now turn left and go under the flower stand and continue towards the big bridge with the cyclists, have you seen it yet?
¿ves a dos personas paseando en bicicleta por un puente grande? debería estar justo después del puesto de flores, hacia el oeste

chat.msg: hey there, estas listo?
si adonde estas
estoy en la carpa al norte del mapa
Where do we continue, friend?
go down until you come to the road
cool, i see a dog sitting by a fire and a red mushroom is on the right of the fire
¿es esto correcto?
si, go right and go between the dog and the fire and go back on to the road
got it, just passed between the dog and fire, found a blue car parked south of the mushroom
¿adónde ahora?
follow the road going down until you come across a telescope
okay, followed the road and now i'm at the blue telescope
veo unas rocas y una casa de madera al oeste. ¿qué sigue?
keep following the road to your left and to to the cabin and you will be at your destination
alright! walking towards the house now, surrounded by rocks
*finished* mate! we made it!

chat.msg: hola, you ready?
ready
nice! start moving under the first palm tree to your south-west. then, take a right, cross the second palm, and swerve left before you hit the third one
sigue hacia el sur. genial hasta ahora?
ok now what
next, pass to the left of the adorable brown puppy up ahead
afterwards, take a slight left and then a swift right heading south
ok y ahora
great! now, you'll see a big rock to your left and a small one to your right
camina recto entre ellos hacia el agua más adelante
ok now what
good job! now, time for a splash. get into the water and you'll find a huge red crab
turn right, and start following the big rock on your left. keep heading west
ok now what
keep going until you pass a medium-sized rock
Entonces, ¡cuidado con el tiburón!
ok y ahora
time to spin to the right, sharp turn!
ok
ready for some dry land again? great! head back to the land, between the medium rock and a colorful ball
hacia el norte ahora
ok now what
time to swerve a bit, go slight left and keep heading towards the northwest
ok
perfecto! now pass between that red tent on your left and the big speaker on your right
ok y ahora
¿Listo para un pequeño paseo? rodea la tienda en forma de arco
ok
now, head south back towards the water, but stop just before you reach it
can you see a red kayak on your right?
Yes I see it
excellent! turn right now and pass under that kayak
¡sigue adelante!
ok y ahora
now, take a right (north) and walk along the kayak until you reach a tiny green bush
nice work, buddy!

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: I think its fine, I think that everyone does it
